summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Mercer Street, from Thirtieth Avenue North to Washington Boulevard, and from Thirty-second Avenue North to Thirty-sixth Avenue North; East Valley Street, from Thirty-third Avenue North to Thirty-seventh Avenue North; Washington Boulevard, from East Madison Street to Thirty-second Avenue North; Thirty-second Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street; Thirty-third Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street; Thirty-fourth Avenue North, from East Valley Street to East Mercer Street; and Seventh-seventh Avenue North, from East Ward Street to East Mercer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same in accordance with Resolution No. 587 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
